content:
{"name": "Montgomery College - Germantown Mobile Food Market", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Mobile Market provides fresh fruits, vegetables, and other foods to MC students, faculty/staff, and No proof of eligibility is required. Food is available on a first-come, first-serve basis. The Mobile Market is a partnership between Montgomery College and the Capital Area Food Bank. If you're interested in volunteering with the Mobile Market, please fill out the [volunteer form](https://www.signupgenius.com/go/10c0c4fadaf2aa4fdce9-shaw#/) 

2025:
January 29,
February 26,
March 26,
April 23,
June 4,
July 2
July 30
.
* Location: Outside the Dr. DeRionne P. Pollard Student Affairs and Science Building (SA)/Bus Circle (Inclement weather: BE Circle)

* Dates:
	Time: 10 a.m.–noon", "email": "", "url": "https://www.montgomerycollege.edu/life-at-mc/student-health-and-wellness/fuel-for-success-food-campaign.html?fbclid=IwAR0rUziSyYdjXgOy3zalKydPFZNZSdKqNB1w5RoyqLT7PUvTCqGnMyDpHhw", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20200 Observation Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Germantown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20876", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.1849425, "longitude": -77.2485528}, "phones": [{"number": "(251) 744-4411", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
